narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Christopher Adams is a Counselor, Professional provider based in Towson, MD. From 2018-01 through 2018-07, this provider received $115K in Medicaid payments across 2K claims serving 564 beneficiaries, billing 2 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: 96% of all billing comes from a single procedure code: 90847 (90847). This extreme concentration is unusual and may indicate specialized services or a narrow billing pattern.
Billing stopped in 2018-07, suggesting this provider is no longer active in Medicaid. Abrupt cessation of billing can be a risk indicator.
